name: The Light (itch) (Extrone)
description:
Description

The Light is an Interactive story adventure game, where you have to help The Light to restore the Global Illumination. You do this by exploring the place and finding the Post Process Volume and place The Light inside it.

There is not much gameplay since I mainly focused on making the UI/UX look great. Because of that didn't have much time to make good gameplay. I really like making good and easy to use UI, so that's was my main focus with this project 😄
